name: netalertx
description: NetAlertX is a network scanning and monitoring tool designed for self-hosting. It visualizes devices, alerts users when new devices connect, and integrates with Home Assistant for network awareness.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive notifications when new or unknown devices join the network

features.title: Home Assistant Integration
features.description: Send device presence data to Home Assistant for automation triggers

features.title: Custom Notifications
features.description: Configure alerts via email, webhooks, or push services for network events

features.title: Mac Address Tracking
features.description: Monitor devices by hardware address even when IP addresses change
